# NSSupportsLiveActivities

**Property List Key**

A Boolean value that indicates whether an app supports Live Activities.

## Discussion

Set the corresponding value to `true` to enable your app to display live data on the Lock Screen and in the Dynamic Island. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ActivityKit/displaying-live-data-with-live-activities].

## Live Activities

- **NSSupportsLiveActivitiesFrequentUpdates**: A Boolean value that indicates whether an app can update its Live Activities frequently.
